short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automating the entire job application process with accuracy and explainability; from targeted resume generation to auto applying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opener is your intelligent job application assistant that streamlines the entire application process using AI technology. 

Key Features:
• Smart Auto-Fill: Automatically fills job applications with AI-generated responses tailored to your resume
• AI Resume Generator: Creates customized resumes optimized for each job posting
• Job Match Analysis: Analyzes job descriptions and matches them with your qualifications
• Real-time Accuracy Scoring: Shows confidence scores for auto-filled responses
• Multi-platform Support: Works on major job sites including LinkedIn Jobs, Indeed, and Glassdoor

How It Works:
1. Visit any job posting page
2. Click the Opener extension icon
3. Choose between auto-filling the application or generating a tailored resume
4. Review and submit your application

Privacy & Security:
• Your data is securely processed and encrypted
• No sensitive information is stored locally
• Compliant with modern privacy standards

Perfect for:
• Job seekers looking to streamline their application process
• Professionals targeting multiple positions
• Anyone wanting to optimize their job application success rate

Get started with Opener today and make your job search more efficient and effective!
